title: Palo Alto Cortex XDR - Alerts
description: This dashboard provides information about the Alerts generated on Palo Alto Cortex XDR.

definition.content:
## Overview

This dashboard provides information about the Alerts generated on Palo Alto Cortex XDR.

### Widgets

1. Total Alerts
2. Total High Alerts
3. Total Medium Alerts
4. Total Low Alerts
5. Total Informational Alerts
6. Total Unknown Alerts
7. Severity Over Time
8. Distribution by Type
9. Distribution by Source
10. Top 10 Host Details
11. Distribution by Action
12. Distribution by Matching Status
13. Distribution by Starred Status
14. Distribution by Category
15. Distribution Over Event Type
16. Top 10 Users
17. Distribution by Module Id
18. Top 10 Mitre Tactic Id and Name
19. Agent Details
20. Featured Alert Fields
21. Distribution by Whitelist Status
22. Alerts by Country
23. Log Details

definition.title: Top 10 Mitre Tactic Id and Name
